SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.logger

Class AppLogger

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.logger.AppLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILogger
public class AppLogger extends Object implements ILogger
Singleton class for application logging. Allows configuration of logging strategies that include console logging, file logging, or a combination of both.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.logger.ILogger

  • Method Details

    • log

      public void log(ILogger.LogLevel level, String message, StackTraceElement[] stackTrace)
      Logs a message along with its level and stack trace using the configured LogStrategy.
      Specified by:
      log in interface ILogger
      Parameters:
      level - The severity level of the log.
      message - The message to be logged.
      stackTrace - The stack trace elements associated with the log.

    • getInstance

      public static AppLogger getInstance()
      Provides the singleton instance of AppLogger.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of AppLogger.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the AppLogger has not yet been set up with a LogStrategy.

    • setUpAppLogger

      public static void setUpAppLogger()
      Initializes the AppLogger with a LogStrategy selected by the user input. Prompts the user to choose between console logging, file logging, or combined logging.
